name: Orange, Chili And Rosemary Steaming Liquid
keywords: orange juice, rosemary, white wine, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 small jalapeno pepper, cut across into thin slices

recipeInstructions.text: Place the orange juice, orange zest, rosemary, jalapeno pepper, the white wine and the water into the desired steaming equipment. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 minute. Begin steaming. Add boiling water if too much of the liquid evaporates before cooking is complete.
